name: Macrophage (RoyalSkies)
description: Embark on an Adventure with Lone Macrophage; the biggest baddest white blood cell in the entire body! Together, you'll have to fight off a relentless army of germs and infections to keep the body safe. As you progress and gain more experience, you'll unlock new weapons and abilities to help keep the enemy Viruses at bay - Keeping the body healthy is a full-time job, so show no mercy, because you will receive none!!!
